query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'sales' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3p9fhY9wEnC59QX.root --database kez2oyxfSHFekZFiUAQt4p --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'sales' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
stdout:
column_name	data_type
id	int
userId	int
productName	varchar
productCategory	varchar
quantity	int
unitPrice	decimal
totalAmount	decimal
saleDate	timestamp
customerName	varchar
orderReference	varchar
createdAt	timestamp
saleType	enum
paymentGateway	varchar
emailMarketing	varchar
